about.title: About StageEvery
about.content: StageEvery is a platform for artists and music creators to create, manage, and present an online profile, including music-related content, media, and contact information.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be at least 13 years old to use StageEvery.

account.title: Account Registration and Authentication
account.content: StageEvery uses Google OAuth for authentication. You are responsible for maintaining the accuracy and security of your account.

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of all content you submit, including profile information, date of birth, phone number, images, videos, music-related content, social links, and other information you voluntarily provide.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.content: You agree not to misuse the service, violate applicable laws, or infringe the rights of others.

pricing.title: Free and Paid Features
pricing.content: StageEvery currently provides free access to core features. Some advanced features may require payment in the future.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You may stop using StageEvery at any time. We may suspend or terminate access if these Terms are violated.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided on an “as is” basis without warranties of any kind.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: StageEvery is not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms and may require renewed acceptance.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We may collect personal information such as email address, display name, date of birth (optional), phone number (optional), profile images, videos, music-related content, social media links, and any other information you voluntarily provide.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use this information to create and manage accounts, provide and improve the service, display user profiles, and communicate important service-related messages.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.content: StageEvery uses Google OAuth for authentication and does not store passwords.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell personal data. Information is shared only with essential service providers.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your data while your account remains active or as required to provide the service.

security.title: Security
security.content: We apply reasonable security measures, but no system is completely secure.

children.title: Children’s Privacy
children.content: StageEvery is not intended for users under the age of 13.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You may access, update, or delete your personal data at any time.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: Updates to this policy may require renewed consent.
